com.threerings.chat

Class SubtitleChatOverlay

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.threerings.chat.ChatOverlay
      • com.threerings.chat.SubtitleChatOverlay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChatDisplay, HistoryList.Observer, EventListener, ChangeListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComicChatOverlay

    public class SubtitleChatOverlay
extends ChatOverlay
implements ChangeListener, HistoryList.Observer
    Implements subtitle chat.
